about_the_game:
Add to wishlist and follow us to get our latest news！


Story:

The school has to let me be the personal study companion of international students, and I have to take three of them at once?
And as the only man in an all-girls school, will it feel like you’ve been chosen by someone else if you choose me?
Senior, can you please stop dragging me into being your fake boyfriend?
Junior, stop teasing me by changing your identity all the time. I’m really busy.
Teacher, in order to gain credits, I am willing to be a class leader.
In order to secure my research spot, I must skillfully deal with them.

Stage:
Modern cities, The vibrant university, pretty girls in short skirts, and intellectual female teachers! Youth leaves no regrets

Character:
International students
Sierra: Sexy and hot, from LATIN, International exchange student in music department

Sophia: Icy beauty, from RU, International exchange student in dance department

Yuna: Sweet junior, from JP, International exchange student in art department

Schoolmates
Xia Xueshu, your sexy senior with black long straight hair

Li Ziying & Li Zilin, twin Junior, are also your childhood sweetheart(s)

Nangong Yue, mature woman who full of charm, your counselor and life coach

Game highlights:
  • 3D new form of GAL, watch beauties in a different taste
  • Plot tree system
  • A refreshing novel about school love
  • Voice dubbing
  • 2K high-definition CG pictures 1000+
  • 15W+ words plot
  • CG appreciation system

content_descriptors.notes: Parts of the game contain sexy costumes and sexually suggestive lines and may not be suitable for all ages

short_description: I failed the entrance exam and was transferred to a women's college. And the school had to assign me to be the international student's study partner? Ladies, can you please go away, I just want to study hard. This visual novel game focuses on college life, with a fun plot and full of fan service...
